thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com | 4 of 52
thread.title: Annabel

author: Annabel
title: Annabel
text:
The delivery process was so detailed, and I was able to get in touch with the Saatchi Art staff to understand when the painting was to be collected from the Artist's home. They were super quick on responding me. (I would say, within an hour of when I emailed or even sooner.)
Once it was collected from the Artist's home, I had a DHL tracking number which updated me where the package was until it arrived at my home.
The packaging was in top condition and Saatchi had used many protective layers to keep the painting in perfect condition.
I would definitely shop with Saatchi Art again just because it is so reliable and delivers art that is as genuine as it is shown online.
